segments.text: Hello , Kith , can you and Alice come around this evening ? We prefer your coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we would be able to make it . What time shall we come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we bring any thing ? Some wine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not really . Just bring yourselves . We would like to your presence .
segments.speaker: S1
